verbose_text: Peters et al. established a line of hIL6R transgenic mice, driven by phosphoenolpyruvate carboxykinase gene promoter, in which serum concentrations of soluble hIL6R were described to range between 4 and 8 mug/mL XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR, several hundred times higher than those in human.
evidence: hIL6R transgenic mice, driven by phosphoenolpyruvate carboxykinase
